<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2394</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The World Wide School Library</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Weltweite Schule-Bibliothek</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Bibliothèque Mondiale D'École</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Biblioteca Larga Da Escola Do Mundo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Libreria In tutto il mondo Della Scuola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η παγκόσμια σχολική βιβλιοθήκη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Biblioteca Mundial De la Escuela</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A library of well known books for high school children.Each book is divided up into separate chapters which can be accessed and read online.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">library</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">books</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Bibliothek der weithin bekannten Bücher 
für High School children.Each Buch wird oben in unterschiedliche 
Kapitel geteilt, die online erreicht werden und lesen können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une bibliothèque des livres bien connus pour le 
livre du lycée children.Each est divisée en chapitres séparés qui 
peuvent être consultés en ligne et lus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma biblioteca de livros bem sabidos para o livro
da High School children.Each é dividida acima nos capítulos 
separados que podem ser alcançados e lido em linha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una libreria dei libri ben noti per il libro 
della High School children.Each è divisa nei capitoli separati che 
possono essere raggiunti e leggere in linea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια βιβλιοθήκη των καλά γνωστών βιβλίων για τα παιδιά
γυμνασίου Κάθε βιβλίο διαιρείται επάνω σε χωριστά 
κεφάλαια που μπορούν να προσεγγιστούν και να διαβάσουν on-line.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una biblioteca de los libros bien conocidos para 
el libro de la High School secundaria children.Each se divide para 
arriba en los capítulos separados que pueden ser alcanzados y leer en
línea.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bibliothek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bücher</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bibliothèque</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">livres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biblioteca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">livros</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">libreria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">libri</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιβλιοθήκη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογοτεχνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιβλία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">biblioteca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">libros</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
